name: Battle of shot
description:
Welcome to Battle Of Shot: throw the balls at your opponents or get hit.      Play offline with bots, choose your skin, control your character and try to get all the crowns and become the greatest among the others, Take the mysterious boxes scattered around the scenery and use a variety of skills to help you on this journey, but take care of the balls for you or it will be Game Over. Take all the crowns and win the day.   Can you get many crowns? Download now and start shooting! Good luck!  Main Features
  • Realistic graphics
  • Easy gameplay
  • Great songs
